Mayor & City Council
====================





### The City of Carrollton is a Home Rule municipality with a council-manager form of government. The City Council is made up of a mayor and seven councilmembers.

All members of the Council are elected at-large and serve three-year staggered terms. They are community volunteers who meet in regular meetings twice a month.
The role of the Mayor and City Council is to enact local legislation, provide vision for the future of Carrollton, set policy, and hire a City Manager.

* [City Council Agendas & Videos](https://www.cityofcarrollton.com/?navid=2498)
* [City Organizational Chart](https://www.cityofcarrollton.com/government/city-manager-s-office/organizational-chart)



* [View a calendar of upcoming City Council Meetings](https://www.cityofcarrollton.com/about-us/calendar)
* [What district am I in? View an interactive map.](https://cityofcarrollton.maps.arcgis.com/apps/webappviewer/index.html?id=36208799addd42f4a915a3dcf82924f8)

City Council meetings are generally held the first and third Tuesday of each month in the City Council Chamber on the second floor of
[City Hall](https://www.cityofcarrollton.com/?splash=https%3a%2f%2fwww.google.com%2fmaps%2fplace%2f1945%2bE%2bJackson%2bRd%2c%2bCarrollton%2c%2bTX%2b75006%2f%4032.9763223%2c-96.891328%2c17z%2fdata%3d!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x864c267782698837%3a0xfb9c4aa7295a3e61!8m2!3d32.9763178!4d-96.8891393&____isexternal=true)
: 1945 E. Jackson Rd. Carrollton, TX 75006.

  **Mayor**
  and
  **Places 2, 4,**
  and
  are elected at-large and may reside anywhere in the City of Carrollton.




City Council reviews the Council Goals at the Strategic Planning Session every summer.
